infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: We need camera access to let you take progress photos and scan food barcodes for easy logging.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: We need photo library access to let you select and upload progress photos.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: We need permission to save your progress photos to your photo library.
infoPlist.NSUserNotificationsUsageDescription: We'll send you helpful reminders for meals and workouts to keep you on track with your goals.
